lead_paragraph: LACOFF--David, age 92, died peacefully on Monday, July 11, 2016. David proudly served in the Army in World War II. He graduated from CCNY and started Mechanical Development Corp with his brother Hy. They built the mainframes for the largest global computer manufacturers. David's passions were fishing, poker, and creating works of art. His biggest passion however was his family. David was a loving husband, father, grandfather, and great-grandfather. He will be sorely missed. Donations may be made to ORT America. 1/3
